metadata.title: CVE-2023-1252 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s Ext4 File System inhow a user triggers several file operations simultaneously with the overlayFS usage. This flaw allows a local user to crash or potentially escalatetheir privileges on the system. Only if patch 9a2544037600 ("ovl: fix useafter free in struct ovl_aio_req") not applied yet, the kernel could beaffected.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
